name: Connect King
description:
A puzzle game that connect the same color and fills all fields

- You can choose 4 different difficulty level Easy, Normal, Hard, Master
- Thousands of problem, you can complete the step-by-step difficulty.
- If you win in multiplayer, you can get a free problem.
- Invite your friends to enjoy the multiplayer.
- Support multiplayer, achievements and leaderboard.
- Support all tablet devices.
